item.title: Latest Tech News Febuary 2025-02-19
item.description:
ðŸš€ Microsoft Claims Quantum Computing Breakthrough

Â 

Microsoft has announced a major advancement in quantum computing by successfully harnessing Majorana fermions, exotic particles theorized in 1937. This breakthrough could lead to practical quantum computers by the end of the decade, potentially surpassing competitors.

ðŸ”¹ Microsoft introduced Majorana 1, a processor featuring eight topological qubits, with potential scaling to one million qubits.

ðŸ”— Read more on FT

Â  Mira Murati, former Chief Technology Officer of OpenAI, has founded a new venture called Thinking Machines Lab.
